mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEW ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(REVIEW_STAR, REVIEW_CONTENT, USER_ID, REVIEW_DATE, MENU_NAME, REVIEW_IMAGE, ORDER_DETAIL_NUMBER) VALUES(#{reviewStar}, #{reviewContent}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{menuName}, #{reviewImage}, #{order_detail_number})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_STAR = #{reviewStar}, REVIEW_IMAGE = #{reviewImage}, REVIEW_CONTENT = #{reviewContent} WHERE ORDER_DETAIL_NUMBER = #{orderDetailNumber} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
